<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1129749_mysmartp_tickets_generated</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>PopulateUserData</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var userId = current.u_customer_name_1;
	gs.addInfoMessage("Id : "+userId);
	gs.addInfoMessage("Name : "+userId.first_name);
	
	var grv = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	grv.addQuery('sys_id',userId);
	grv.query();
	gs.addInfoMessage("hii");
	while(grv.next()){
		gs.addInfoMessage("Second : "+userId.email);
		gs.addInfoMessage("Third : "+grv.email);
		var email = grv.email;
		var mobileNo = grv.mobile_number;
		var mobileModel = grv.mobile_model;
		var email1 = grv.email;
		var mobileNo1 = grv.mobile_number;
		var mobileModel1 = grv.mobile_model;
		gs.addInfoMessage('Email : '+email);
		gs.addInfoMessage('Mob No : '+mobileNo);
		gs.addInfoMessage('Model : '+mobileModel);
		gs.addInfoMessage('Email1 : '+email1);
		gs.addInfoMessage('Mob No1 : '+mobileNo1);
		gs.addInfoMessage('Model1 : '+mobileModel1);
// 		current.setValue('email',grv.email);
// 		current.setValue('mobile_number',grv.mobile_number);
// 		current.setValue('mobile_model',grv.mobile_model);
// 		current.setValue('mobile_imei_number',grv.mobile_imei_number);
// 		current.setValue()
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-01 09:59:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>933b99d097eb795053f8b5a6f053afe7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PopulateUserData</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MySmartphone Service Center" source="x_1129749_mysmartp">12ba0113975f755053f8b5a6f053af6a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MySmartphone Service Center">12ba0113975f755053f8b5a6f053af6a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_933b99d097eb795053f8b5a6f053afe7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-02 06:05:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=933b99d097eb795053f8b5a6f053afe7"/></record_update>
